meanings.sent1: The reinvasion of the ants into the kitchen caused chaos.
meanings.sent2: The country prepared for the reinvasion by strengthening its borders.
meanings.sent3: The reinvasion of the squirrels into the attic was like a never-ending game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The reinvasion of memories flooded her mind like a sudden storm.
meanings.sent5: The reinvasion of weeds in the garden was relentless and unstoppable.

meanings.definition: The process of being invaded again.
meanings.sent1: The scientists studied the reinvasion of the virus in the body.
meanings.sent2: The defense system was overwhelmed by the rapid reinvasion of bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The reinvasion of tourists to the beach made the seagulls happy with more snacks to steal.
meanings.sent4: The reinvasion of technology in our lives felt like a silent takeover.
meanings.sent5: The reinvasion of old habits crept back slowly, unnoticed at first.
